imdb.plot outline: Respected career coach Emily Liou dives in with some of today's most talented businesses, brands and careers to share personal and professional development insights geared toward ultimate career success and happiness. Through interviews, reviews, showcases, and skits to illustrate and entertain, each episode tackles different topics from how to get a quality job to how to find and achieve your goals. The Career Tea will uncover the mysteries behind professional success - come enjoy a sip.
imdb.title: Career Tea
plot: Emily Liou dives in with some of today's most talented businesses, brands and careers to share personal and professional development insights geared toward ultimate career success and happiness. Enjoy a sip of the Career tea.

Respected career coach Emily Liou dives in with some of today's most talented businesses, brands and careers to share personal and professional development insights geared toward ultimate career success and happiness. Through interviews, reviews, showcases, and skits to illustrate and entertain, each episode tackles different topics from how to get a quality job to how to find and achieve your goals. The _Career Tea_ (qv) will uncover the mysteries behind professional success - come enjoy a sip.
